segment.tokens: The Red Calf was always running kicking up his heels

that you would never reach the end of your journey
We do n't think about that
the time when I wished myself a Swallow

She cured me of that foolishness
that Swallows had to fly one wing-beat at a time
that dinners had to be eaten one mouthful at a time that nothing really worth
while could be done in a minute
we would n't live long either
The Red Calf the White Calf spoke together
We will never lose our tempers
We will never be to work
it is not always to do those things
one has to begin over over again
" We are going to talk with our sisters , the Cows "
the pretty Black Calf spoke in her pleasant way " "
" It is enough as easy eating "
" I shall never lose my temper again "
How strong and good you must
me stand beside you in the cubby

they looked into each other 's eyes

While they were quarrelling in this way getting warmer more angry all the time losing those very tempers

they getting warmer more angry all the time losing those very tempers a young Jersey had stepped into the cubby beside the Black Calf
they were having a pleasant visit

which one shall stand in the cubby with me

the two Calves lost their tempers

for the people good-natured always come out ahead in the end
